div.div: Complete the contract on the Woodland Spirit.
Successfully identify your first Wraith and survive
Successfully identify your first Obake and survive
Play a complete game on 2Fort, Dustbowl, Granary, Gravel Pit, Hydro, and Well (CP).
Accumulate 25000 heal points as a Medic.
Play in a game with five or more players from your Friends list.
Kill or incapacitate 2 enemies with the same sniper rifle shot.
Rescue a Wenja captive from the Izila.
